items.title: Figma Crash Course
items.description: A deep dives into powerful Figma features like prototyping, auto-layout, systems, and illustration.

items.title: The future of CSS: Higher Level Custom Properties
items.description: An article on having one CSS Custom Property control a varying set of other properties by using Higher Level Custom Properties.

items.title: LinkAce
items.description: A self-hosted bookmark archive, which is free and open source.

items.title: useAnimations
items.description: A library for animated icons in the Lottie Framework for immediate implementation to your apps or websites.

items.title: new.css
items.description: A classless CSS framework to write modern websites using only HTML.

items.title: Openbase
items.description: Find and compare open-source packages with user reviews, categorization, and more

items.title: OpenScan
items.description: An open-source app to scan hard copies of documents or notes and convert them into a PDF file.

items.title: 2020 JavaScript Rising Stars
items.description: The annual round-up of the JavaScript landscape, comparing the number of stars added on GitHub.

items.title: Test for accessibility
items.description: A nice article with seven ways to test for accessibility of your web site with browser Developer Tools.

items.title: IDEA
items.description: A series of nonverbal algorithm assembly instructions, that explain how various popular algorithms work.

items.title: Snapcode
items.description: A nice code snippets manager, which is free to use and open-source.
